translations: n.[金融]存款；[地质]沉积物（deposit 的复数）；订金
v.[地质]沉积（deposit 的单三形式）；存储；付保证金

phrs.translation: 办理存款业务，吸收存款

sentences.sentence: All the other candidates lost their deposits.
sentences.translation: 所有其余候选人都失掉了竞选保证金。

sentences.sentence: Deposits of plaque build up between the tooth and the gum.
sentences.translation: 牙菌斑的沉积物在牙齿和牙龈间形成。

sentences.sentence: Only a small fraction of a bank's total deposits will be withdrawn at any one time.
sentences.translation: 任何时候，一家银行的总存款只有少量会被提取。
